snippet: So dismal was the love life of Steven Blier, the artistic director of the New York Festival of Song, he emphatically declared in the summer of 1996 that he was “Not. Dating. Capital N, capital D.”
abstract: Vows column on wedding of Steven Blier and James S Russell. Photos (M)4
lead_paragraph: AS the artistic director of the New York Festival of Song, Steven Blier can conjure up a ballad, madrigal or lied appropriate to any romantic situation. But until he met James S. Russell, his own love life was the stuff of plaintive standards like Ira Gershwin and Vernon Duke's ''I Can't Get Started'' and George and Ira Gershwin's ''But Not for Me,'' which Mr. Blier still can't bear to hear.

headline.main: Steven Blier and James S. Russell
